ðŸ“– Summary: The machbase-neo repository provides an IoT database server that combines a time-series database with MQTT and HTTP APIs for data ingestion and a web UI for visualization. It's designed for building IoT platforms, enabling data collection from sensors, storage, and real-time analysis.
